pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Start with a 14-day free trial, upgrade as you grow

q1.question: Can I change plans later?
q1.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

q2.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q2.answer: We accept all major credit cards via Stripe.

q3.question: Is there a free trial?
q3.answer: Yes! Every new workspace gets a 14-day free trial with access to all trial features. After the trial ends, upgrade to Basic or Pro to continue using your workspace.

q4.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q4.answer: Yes, cancel anytime from your workspace settings. No questions asked.

hero.headline: Easy-to-Create Operation Manuals for Restaurants, Clinics, and Retail Stores
hero.subheadline: Creating and updating manuals is time-consuming. Training new staff is difficult. Transform your business with video and image-based manuals.

pain1.title: Paper manuals are hard to update
pain1.description: Every time you update a procedure, you have to reprint and redistribute

pain2.title: Training new staff takes too much time
pain2.description: Verbal explanations are time-consuming and inconsistent

pain3.title: Creating video manuals is difficult
pain3.description: Complex video editing software is hard to learn and use

pain4.title: Staff don't use the manuals
pain4.description: Manuals are hard to access and understand when needed

feature1.title: Add annotations to videos
feature1.description: Highlight important parts with arrows, text, and chapters. Make it easy for anyone to understand at a glance.

feature2.title: Easy image editing too
feature2.description: Add highlights, text, and shapes to images. Perfect for equipment instructions and checklists.

feature3.title: Instant mobile access via QR code
feature3.description: Scan QR codes to access manuals instantly from smartphones. Perfect for on-the-job reference.

restaurant.title: Restaurants
restaurant.example: Video tutorials for new menu items
restaurant.description: Record cooking procedures and plating techniques. New staff can learn quickly and maintain consistent quality.

clinic.title: Clinics
clinic.description: Create visual guides for medical equipment and procedures. Reduce mistakes and improve patient safety.

retail.title: Retail Stores
retail.example: Video guides for POS and customer service
retail.description: Standardize checkout procedures and customer interactions. Ensure consistent service quality.

step1.title: Create a document
step1.description: Start with a blank document or template

step3.title: Add annotations and publish
step3.description: Highlight key points and share with your team

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your business needs

testimonial1.quote: Manual creation time was reduced from 3 days to half a day. Video annotations are especially easy to understand.
testimonial1.author: Restaurant Manager

testimonial2.quote: New staff can now learn equipment procedures on their own. Training burden has been significantly reduced.
testimonial2.author: Clinic Director

testimonial3.quote: QR code access allows staff to check manuals on the spot. Very convenient for busy retail environments.
testimonial3.author: Store Manager

q1.question: Are there any limitations during the free trial?
q1.answer: The free trial includes 10 documents and 1 workspace. You can use all core features including video annotations, image editing, and QR code access.

q2.question: Do I need a credit card for the trial?
q2.answer: No credit card is required. Simply sign up with your email to start your 14-day free trial.

q3.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q3.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your data will be retained for 30 days after cancellation.

q4.question: Is my data secure?
q4.answer: Yes, all data is encrypted and stored securely. We use industry-standard security practices and comply with data protection regulations.

q5.question: Can I use it on mobile devices?
q5.answer: Yes, our platform is fully responsive and works on smartphones and tablets. Staff can access manuals anytime, anywhere.

q6.question: What video formats are supported?
q6.answer: We support MP4, MOV, and WebM formats. Videos are automatically optimized for web playback.

finalCta.title: Ready to Transform Your Training?
finalCta.subtitle: Join hundreds of businesses already using our platform
finalCta.trustBadge: No credit card required • Cancel anytime

agreement.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
agreement.content: By accessing or using SOP Manual ("Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access the Service.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: SOP Manual is a software platform that allows users to create, manage, and share standard operating procedure manuals with video and image annotations. The Service includes tools for document creation, media editing, collaboration, and distribution.

accounts.title: 3. User Accounts
accounts.intro: To use certain features of the Service, you must register for an account. You agree to:
requirements: Provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration
Maintain the security of your password and account
Promptly notify us of any unauthorized use of your account
Accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account
accounts.ageRequirement: You must be at least 18 years old to use this Service. By using the Service, you represent that you meet this age requirement.

payment.title: 4. Subscription and Payment
payment.intro: Some aspects of the Service may be provided for a fee. You agree to pay all fees associated with your subscription plan. Subscription fees are billed in advance on a recurring basis (monthly or annually).
terms: Fees are non-refundable except as required by law or as expressly stated in these Terms
We reserve the right to change our fees upon 30 days' notice
You may cancel your subscription at any time, effective at the end of your current billing period
Failure to pay fees may result in suspension or termination of your account

userContent.title: 5. User Content
userContent.ownership: You retain all rights to the content you upload, create, or share through the Service ("User Content"). By uploading User Content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, store, display, and distribute your User Content solely for the purpose of providing and improving the Service.
warrantyList: You own or have the necessary rights to all User Content you submit
Your User Content does not violate any third-party rights, including intellectual property rights
Your User Content does not contain illegal, harmful, or offensive material

prohibited.title: 6. Prohibited Uses
prohibited.intro: You agree not to use the Service:
list: In any way that violates any applicable law or regulation
To transmit any harmful, threatening, abusive, or defamatory content
To impersonate or misrepresent your affiliation with any person or entity
To interfere with or disrupt the Service or servers
To attempt to gain unauthorized access to any portion of the Service
To use automated systems to access the Service without our permission
To upload viruses, malware, or any malicious code

intellectual.title: 7. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: The Service and its original content (excluding User Content), features, and functionality are owned by SOP Manual and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.
intellectual.restrictions: You may not copy, modify, distribute, sell, or lease any part of our Service without our prior written permission.

privacy.title: 8. Data Privacy
privacy.content: Your use of the Service is also governed by our Privacy Policy. We collect, use, and protect your personal information as described in our Privacy Policy. By using the Service, you consent to our collection and use of your data as outlined in the Privacy Policy.

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.ourRights: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including if you breach these Terms.
termination.effect: Upon termination, your right to use the Service will immediately cease. If you wish to terminate your account, you may simply discontinue using the Service or contact us to request account deletion.

disclaimer.title: 10. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.asIs: The Service is provided "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including but not limited to implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement.
list: The Service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free
The results obtained from using the Service will be accurate or reliable
Any errors in the Service will be corrected

limitation.title: 11. Limitation of Liability
limitation.intro: To the maximum extent permitted by law, SOP Manual shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses resulting from:
scenarios: Your use or inability to use the Service
Any unauthorized access to or use of our servers and/or any personal information stored therein
Any interruption or cessation of transmission to or from the Service
Any bugs, viruses, or other harmful code that may be transmitted through the Service
Any errors or omissions in any content or for any loss or damage incurred as a result of the use of any content

indemnification.title: 12. Indemnification
indemnification.intro: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless SOP Manual and its employees, contractors, agents, officers, and directors from and against any and all claims, damages, obligations, losses, liabilities, costs, or debt, and expenses arising from:
scenarios: Your use of and access to the Service
Your violation of any term of these Terms
Your violation of any third-party right, including any copyright, property, or privacy right
Any claim that your User Content caused damage to a third party

changes.title: 13. Changes to Terms
changes.modification: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion.
changes.continued: By continuing to access or use our Service after revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms. If you do not agree to the new terms, please stop using the Service.

governing.title: 14. Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which SOP Manual operates, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

contact.title: 15. Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:
